techmeme.title: The US chip situation is precarious and requires bold moves like ending the China chip ban and building more trailing edge fabs in the US (Ben Thompson/Stratechery)
Uniswap Labs says the US SEC has closed its probe into the company and will not file enforcement actions, after the SEC dropped OpenSea and Robinhood probes (Cheyenne Ligon/CoinDesk)
Framework unveils the Framework Laptop 13 with AMD Ryzen AI 300, priced at $1,099 for a pre-built model, and Framework Laptop 12 with a touch screen, price TBA (Andrew E. Freedman/Tom's Hardware)
Perfect, a startup from the founder of AnyVision that helps job recruiters write and publish job listings and triage responses, raised a $23M seed (Ingrid Lunden/TechCrunch)
Framework announces its first desktop PC, the Framework Desktop, which starts at $1,099 and comes with an AMD Ryzen AI Max 385 and 32GB RAM, slated for Q3 2025 (Andrew Cunningham/Ars Technica)
